document_data.name: Pharran Nicostas
document_data.History: Pharran was a drow warrior who went to Blingdestone. He refused to go home afterwards and somehow after his death became a wight. He remained sitting on the throne of the city's kings until [[1479 DR]], when an adventuring party hired by [[Kargien Dissengulp]] defeated him and his [[skeleton]] minions.
document_data.Personality: Pharran had in life the ambition to become the conqueror of Blingdenstone and this ambition sustained him even after death.
